summary:
elu titanic AU:
- instead of sentences like "you jump i jump" we get "pas peur? pas peur" 
- "how would you draw me"
- (eliott...
body:
elu titanic AU:

- instead of sentences like “you jump i jump” we get “pas peur? pas peur”

- “how would you draw me”

- (eliott doesn’t die ok they survive and get married and adopt 24 hedgehogs and 24 raccoons)

feel free to add more or come up with other movie/books au ideas! Let’s make our days a bit brighter since we’ve all been in tears since friday

tags: edit: rock is apparently rock n roll dancing
summary: Hey! Curious question: do you know if Axel speaks another language?
question: Hey! Curious question: do you know if Axel speaks another language?
answer:
did i just download his CV to find this out??? yes, i did (its on the website of his agency)

and yes, it says there that he speaks english and basic german. i dont think we ever saw him speaking english (or german) tho?? im not sure

I found another very very important information: he apparently is a dancer and the styles listed are classic, rock and salsa????? and im gonna need to see all of that asap

summary: I don't know if it's because I'm a very introverted person or something, but just thinking about going to a screening or at a...
question: I don't know if it's because I'm a very introverted person or something, but just thinking about going to a screening or at a convention to see/talk to actors just sounds like a crazy idea to me. Like, what in the hell do I have to tell those people? I like what I see of them and how good they are with their characters, but that's it really, why even bother them with this stuff?
answer:
Hey! I am also a very introverted person, but I personally like going to that kind of stuff because there’s a special atmosphere. You meet lots of people who have at least one common interest with you, so that’s cool. 

As for meeting the actors…well I personally really like Q&As and that kind of stuff, I like having BTS information! And I didn’t think I’d be able to actually talk to the actors because I am so shy, but that’s also why I challenged myself to do it, and they seemed like really nice people so I just…wanted to meet them. I got to speak to Maxence and he was lovely! I didn’t have time to speak with Axel sadly because he had to leave (I was one of the last people to get a selfie with him). 

But I think if you approach them as normal people, then there’s nothing weird with wanting to meet/talk to them? You do it for the same reason as you would start talking to someone you’ve met at school or at work…But of course that’s not for everyone. There are plenty of people out there whose work I admire, but whom I have no desire to meet…

(Also screenings appeal to me more than the conventions do…there’s usually a strict schedule for conventions, and you don’t get to talk to the actors you meet. but they’re still a lovely experience, since you usually meet cool people :)) - C.

summary: seeing you and @evyisaks have so many maxence feelings suddenly is kind of hilarious.
question: seeing you and @evyisaks have so many maxence feelings suddenly is kind of hilarious.
answer:
listen, it’s literally hurting my heart. I don’t know how to put this in words. 

ok so in the past weeks we’ve seen a lot of videos of maxence so you kind of get used to him as a person and his personality and him honestly being the most adorable and genuine person in the world. you get to see him on screen and realize what a fantastic actor he is and how lucky we are to have him as eliott, and how much dedication he has shown to this role and the show. 

BUT THEN… then you look up his model videos and suddenly you’re hit with that “Oh wow, I had completely forgotten that this person is objectively gorgeous” moment and trying to handle these emotions… it’s a lot and i honestly just can’t. 

Like Maxence Danet Fauvel is literally too much for me to handle. That’s the bottom line of the story. (co-signed by @evyisaks )
